microwave.name: Microwave Chrome
microwave.description: Can run google chrome, only in incognito mode

microwave.name: Microwave Colour
microwave.description: Comes in diffrent colors and has an LED screen

microwave.name: Microwave Apple
microwave.description: An apple shaped microwave with no windows

microwave.name: Microwave Windows
microwave.description: A microwave made out of all windows

dryer.name: M12 Dryer
dryer.description: A dryer that spins at mach 12

dryer.name: M12 Dryer Jam
dryer.description: Turns your lint into 'tasty' jam and plays music while laurdry is drying

dryer.name: M12 Dryer ++
dryer.description: An M12 Dryer with a Microwave M12 on top

dryer.name: M12 Dryer +++
dryer.description: An M12 Dryer with a Microwave M12 and a ToasterOven M12 on top

dryer.name: M12 Dryer +-+
dryer.description: An M12 Dryer with a ToasterOven M12 on top

toasterOven.name: ToasterOven Fire HD
toasterOven.description: Cooks whatever is in the toaster 'well done'

toasterOven.name: ToasterOven +
toasterOven.description: A toaster and ToasterOven M12 combined

toasterOven.name: ToasterOven Ice
toasterOven.description: Makes a cold drink, but only if you toast exactly 7 slices of wheat bread

toasterOven.name: ToasterOven Vision
toasterOven.description: Projects a movie while it makes toast and puts an image on your toast

toasterOven.name: ToasterOven Slingshot
toasterOven.description: Flings your burnt toast to you at mach 12
